overview: In Mike Adriano's Black Anal Beauties, four gorgeous, black sistas go one-on-one with the ass-obsessed king of "POV+," indulging in deep, intimate anal worship, face-fucking and ass-to-mouth fun. This DVD, released on the Buttman Magazine Choice imprint, explores a special brand of WM/BF interracial porn we don't see enough of!
title: Black Anal Beauties
